sentences.en: " More will be coming in. Didn't the bookseller say they're on the way?
sentences.cn: “ 其余的不久也会到, 陈老板不是说过邮包已经在路上 吗 ?

sentences.en: All these books may be had of any bookseller.
sentences.cn: 所有这些书可以从任何书店买到.

sentences.en: At the boy's last remark, the bookseller looked at him curiously.
sentences.cn: 在这个男孩的最后的注释里, 这个书商好奇地看着他.

sentences.en: He asked the bookseller who she was.
He paid the bookseller 15 yuan for the book.
sentences.cn: 他付给书商15元,买下了这本书.

sentences.en: I gave the bookseller an order for the book.
Mitchell has set up in business as a bookseller.
Returns: Unsold stocks returned by a bookseller with the publisher's prior agreement.
sentences.cn: 退书: 书商和出版社预先协议,退回卖不出的书.

sentences.en: She has set up in business as a bookseller.
She inquired for the new book at a bookseller's.
sentences.cn: 她在一家书店询问是否出售那本新书.

sentences.en: She set up shop as a bookseller in Beijing.
sentences.cn: 她在北京开了一家书店.

sentences.en: She set up shop as a bookseller in the High Street.
sentences.cn: 她在大街开了一家书店.

sentences.en: The bookseller keeps for sale blank deeds and other legal documents.
sentences.cn: 该书商出售契约用纸及其他法定证书用纸.

sentences.en: These books are obtainable from any bookseller.
sentences.cn: 这书在任何书商那里都可以买到.

sentences.en: You can get it at any bookseller's.

trans.tran_en: a person or company that sells books
